meanings.definition: A board game in which players move pieces according to the throw of dice.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we all gathered around to play ludo.
meanings.sent2: Let's set up the ludo board and start playing!
meanings.sent3: The ludo pieces danced around the board as we rolled the dice.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ludo, every move is determined by the roll of the dice.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ludo board brought joy to our evening with its simple rules.

meanings.definition: To play the board game Ludo.
meanings.sent1: We decided to ludo after finishing our homework.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys ludoing with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I ludoed so much yesterday that I dreamt of ludoing all night.
meanings.sent4: When feeling bored, they ludo to pass the time.
meanings.sent5: Ludoing together creates a fun and competitive atmosphere among friends.
